title: Interest rates and financial capital flows

content.question: The real interest rate in Country X is 3 percent and is 7 percent in Country Y. Which of the following correctly predicts the effect of the differences in interest rates between the two countries?

choices.label: Country X will experience financial capital outflows, and Country X's currency will appreciate.
Country X will experience financial capital inflows, and Country X's currency will depreciate.
Country Y will experience financial capital outflows, and Country Y's currency will appreciate.
Country Y will experience financial capital inflows, and Country Y's currency will appreciate.
Country Y will experience financial capital inflows, and Country Y's currency will depreciate.

content.answer: Country Y will experience financial capital inflows, and Country Y's currency will appreciate.

unit.text: 6: Open Economy - International Trade and Finance

topic.text: 6.6: Real Interest Rates and International Capital Flows

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Determine the effect(s) of a change in an economic situation using quantitative data or calculations.
